title: Hard Not to Love It
lyrics:
We've been putting in the time, rubbing nickles and dimes
Adding up what we're saving
New tires on the truck, little coffee in your cup
What you wanna name the baby?
Just a couple dreamers for the home team

We're hoping they can pull it through

Always like the underdogdon't we honey, 

?Cause it's kinda like me and you



It ain't always roses, coming up out of the ground

We didn't always get it right (get it right)

But now and then we get it right (get it right)

If it weren't for heartbreak, running out of story now

But it's working out alright (alright)

Life ain't always easy

But it's hard not to love it right now

Right now

Hard not to love it right now

Hmmmm



Every now and then it all comes Together 

And your work calls back to life

Sitting in the grass and you ain't even worried 

If it's greener on the other side

I know right where we've been, to the bottom and back again

You make a real good lover and a damn good friend

I said it once and I'll say it again

You make a real good lover and a damn good friend



It ain't always roses, coming up out of the ground

We didn't always get it right (get it right)

But now and then we get it right (get it right)

If it weren't for heartbreak, running out of story now

But it's working out alright (alright)

Life ain't always easy, but it's hard not to love it right now

Right now

Hard not to love it right now

Yeah



Right now, got you in my arms

Don't know what it did, but I played my cards

Right now, I wouldn't change a thing

If the honey ain't sweet then the bee don't sting

Count off the band baby, one, two, three



It ain't always roses, coming up out of the ground

We didn't always get it right (get it right)

But now and then we get it right (get it right)

If it weren't for heartbreak, running out of story now

But it's working out alright (alright)

Life ain't always easy

But it's hard not to love it right now

Right now

Hard not to love it right now

Right now



Yeah, just a couple dreamers for the home

team, we're hoping they can pull it through

Right now
